name: Mouse Maze: Olympics
description:
> Run in full screen if playing in browser <

Once a year a group of drunken scientist gather to hold the Mouse Maze Olympics and hold bets. Play as a mouse that is placed in a maze and forced to retrieve the Big Cheeses in a limited amount of time. Will you make it in time? Or will you...die from hunger? Will these scientists ever go to jail for animal cruelty?  Find out!
